section.title: What is it
section.p: This is an implementation of a hierarchical network model described in papers by Ravasz et al.

section.title: Credits and references
section.p: Barabasi, A-L. Linked. Cambridge: Perseus Publishing, 2002, p.233+ .
Ravasz, E. and Barabasi, A-L. (2003) Hierarchical organization in complex networks. Phys. Rev. E 67, 026112.
Ravasz, E. et al. (2002) Hierarchical Organization of Modularity in Metabolic Networks. Science 297, 1551.
